name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph C. BRUNER, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph C. BRUNER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Marilyn C. Zilli, James R. Rusato, Harrisburg, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
521 A.2d 929
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph C. BRUNER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 5, 1986.
Decided March 10, 1987.
Marilyn C. Zilli, James R. Rusato, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Richard A. Lewis, Dist. Atty., Yvonne A. Okonieski, Deputy Dist. Atty., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
